attributes.action: Ensure that the current logo for the Olympic Games 2012 be scarpped and a new one sought in it's place.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: That the current logo does not represent Britain, the people of Britain nor the Olympic Games.  That the current logo is more suited to a scribbling on a school book than it is an an emblem of pride for a nation hosting these great Games.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
